scripts.generate:api: uv run python ../scripts/generate_openapi_json.py --out openapi.json && openapi-typescript openapi.json --output types/api.generated.ts && tsx scripts/generate-ui-contracts.mts
scripts.check:api: npm run generate:api && git diff --exit-code -- openapi.json types/api.generated.ts
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:oxlint && npm run lint:doctor
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:oxlint
